title: Sigil Component Configurations
description:
Component configuration types for different visualisation types.

Component-specific configuration using discriminated unions. Each component type has its own config interface with a discriminator field that matches the ComponentType. This provides type safety - when you know the component type, TypeScript narrows to the correct config.

All configs share common properties (title, description, affordances) plus type-specific properties defined in each interface

ComponentConfig.description: Discriminated union of all component configuration types

DataTableConfig.description:
Configuration for data table components.

Data tables display tabular data with rows and columns, supporting common tabular operations like sorting, filtering, and pagination.

Best used with: data_shape = 'tabular'

affordances.description: Interactive capabilities enabled for this table. Common affordances: sorting, filtering, pagination, virtualisation, search, export

description.description: Optional description explaining the component's purpose

HierarchyConfig.description:
Configuration for hierarchy/tree components.

Hierarchy components display nested or tree-structured data with expand/collapse functionality and hierarchical navigation.

Best used with: data_shape = 'hierarchical'

affordances.description: Interactive capabilities enabled for this hierarchy. Common affordances: search, selection, export

description.description: Optional description explaining the component's purpose

CompositionConfig.description:
Configuration for composition components.

Compositions are meta-components that combine multiple sub-components into a unified visualisation (e.g., a dashboard with multiple charts).

Best used with: any data_shape, depending on sub-components

affordances.description: Interactive capabilities for the composition as a whole. Note: sub-components have their own affordances

description.description: Optional description explaining the component's purpose

TextInsightConfig.description:
Configuration for text insight components.

Text insights display textual information, summaries, or key-value metadata in a readable format.

Best used with: data_shape = 'key_value'

affordances.description: Interactive capabilities for text insights. Common affordances: search, export

description.description: Optional description explaining the component's purpose
